I'm offering anyone a chance at a formal debate on this very subject. I recently posted two threads in the "Education" Forum concerning viable alternatives to the education "establishment" (re. Public schools) Anybody interested?

Hmmm.. I would have been interested, but I think the cultural barrier would be too much of a problem with this issue. And if we would try to iron the differences out by making the topic a more general one, I think the discussion might become too theoretic.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Education Establishment vs. Viable Alternatives
